channel.title: Client Crashes after adding new shop? please help!
channel.description:
hay guys, im re-building a source for my friend but something is realy anoying me..
i have added one correct shop for runes,
i am trying to add another next to it for weapons but when i add the second one and log in to check that it works the npc doesn't apear and the client crashes?
[code][IV] Loaded Items [IV] Loaded Shops [IV] Loaded Npc Log [IV] Loaded Npc Spawns [IV] Loaded Content [IV] Connected to SQL Server [IV] Getting Configuration [IV] Configured. [IV] IV Framework loaded on port www.rune-pkz.org:43594 [REGISTERED]: test Game saved for player test [DEREGISTERED]: test[/code]
thats from the run.bat cmd
[code]
RuneFatality #317 is loading. Model cache loaded. Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Error: T2 - 65,81,73 - 19,2742,3464 - 0,0,7,-31,14,108,0,32,4,57,-33,-1,-64,32,-128,0,32,-128,0, Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.build3dScreenMenu<client.java:6095> at client.processRightClick<client.java:7723> at client.draw3dScreen<client.java:10944> at client.method146<client.java:14977> at client.drawGameScreen<client.java:10034> at client.processDrawing<client.java:10873> at RSApplet.run<RSApplet.java:108> at client.run<client.java:5998> at java.lang.Thread.run<Uknown Source> [/code]
any help would be greatfull. thnx

item.title: Client Crashes after adding new shop? please help!
item.dc:creator: @dds_asap dds asap
item.description:
@dds_asap wrote:

hay guys, im re-building a source for my friend but something is realy anoying me…

i have added one correct shop for runes,

i am trying to add another next to it for weapons but when i add the second one and log in to check that it works the npc doesn’t apear and the client crashes?

[IV] Loaded Items [IV] Loaded Shops [IV] Loaded Npc Log [IV] Loaded Npc Spawns [IV] Loaded Content [IV] Connected to SQL Server [IV] Getting Configuration [IV] Configured. [IV] IV Framework loaded on port www.rune-pkz.org:43594 [REGISTERED]: test Game saved for player test [DEREGISTERED]: test

thats from the run.bat cmd


RuneFatality #317 is loading.
Model cache loaded.
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
Error: T2 - 65,81,73 - 19,2742,3464 - 0,0,7,-31,14,108,0,32,4,57,-33,-1,-64,32,-128,0,32,-128,0,
Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException
           at client.build3dScreenMenu<client.java:6095>
           at client.processRightClick<client.java:7723>
           at client.draw3dScreen<client.java:10944>
           at client.method146<client.java:14977>
           at client.drawGameScreen<client.java:10034>
           at client.processDrawing<client.java:10873>
           at RSApplet.run<RSApplet.java:108>
           at client.run<client.java:5998>
           at java.lang.Thread.run<Uknown Source>

any help would be greatfull. thnx
